text:
would be great to have links through the documentation to navigate between the old and new version until it get finished.
Currently looking at forms:
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
Looks like the new snippet to embed on external websites includes a region parameter but is not in the documentation.

Hi. That would be great to be able to set custom Id and/or class to HubSpot sections, rows, columns in CMS page editor to be able to add custom styles and etc. Please thumbs up :+1: who have faced with this. Thanks :pray:
